scripts.build: electron-packager . $npm_package_productName --overwrite --out=dist --ignore='^/dist$' --ignore='^/media$' --prune --asar --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=media/Icon.icns --app-bundle-id=com.maveriks.youtb --sign='Developer ID Application: Erik Amaru Ortiz (YG56YK5007)' --app-version=$npm_package_version --electron-version=$npm_package_electronVersion && cd dist/Youtb-darwin-x64 && zip -ryXq ../Youtb-${npm_package_version}.zip Youtb.app
scripts.build-win: electron-packager . Youtb --overwrite --out=dist --ignore='^/dist$' --ignore='^/media$' --prune --asar --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=media/icon.ico --app-bundle-id=com.maveriks.youtb --sign='Developer ID Application: Erik Amaru Ortiz (YG56YK5007)'
